DOC.brief_summary: This study compare change body composition ( lean mass , fat , bone ) parent rating quality life 5-19 Year Olds function participation one four version Good NEWS 4 Kids Program ( GN4K ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Parental Ratings Quality Life Body Composition 5-19 Year Olds While Participating Good NEWS 4 Kids Program
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : The objective study : 1 . Compare relative efficacy four variation GN4K program facilitate positive change body composition parental rating quality life . 2 . Compare parental rating child 's behavior DXA-measured change body composition ; 3 . Compare measurement scale weight , height , waist/hip ratio BMI DXA-measured change body composition ; 4 . Develop logarithm formula use anthropometric measurement parental rating predict body composition change
DOC.criteria: Must ensure medical provider medical condition would preclude participation Must age 5 19 male female age 5 age 19 pregnant breast feeding
